channel.title: Firemaking
channel.description:
[ul]Started a server for Haven World from scratch, and am bored atm, so i'll post the firemaking work i did last night.
[u][b]Firemaking:[/b][/u] [list] [li]Programmed from scratch.[/li] [li]Logs: Regular, Oak, Willows, Maple, Yew, Magic.[/li] [li]Fire extinguishing, turns into Ashes.[/li] [li]Magic logs: Fires burn randomly between three colours (Blue, Green and Red).[/li][/list]
Watch the video of the Firemaking at: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KhskGafa8dI
Post feedback.[/ul]

item.title: Firemaking
item.dc:creator: @HorisonPk HorisonPk
item.description:
@HorisonPk wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:47, topic:274992”][quote author=HorisonPk link=topic=363303.msg2799275#msg2799275 date=1243271414]

Looks pretty good. I would fix the stepping back(as said before), and also try and stop the animation when the fire is lit. Possibly add colored firelighters in also? I usually don’t allow minor projects, but since this is from scratch I will have an exception. Nice work.

Lol ill fucking take a vid than ill post tomorow cause I gtg now stupid fag dumbass your a retard

Dude its not from scratch lol you people are getting fooled by this loser… Its from final devolution do I even have to proof it I will make a vid and post it here. And you will see
[/quote]
Shut the hell up. I talked to him on MSN and he showed me the code.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

[quote=“si force, post:36, topic:274992”][quote author=dragonchain link=topic=363303.msg2761742#msg2761742 date=1240584670]

Doesn’t the player step back a square when the log is lit?

Agreed, it’s just pointless if you don’t make 100% fire making, as this crap has already been made.
[/quote]

I seriously doubt you could add the WoodCutting skill to this precision without looking at your Czar source client.java, Refer to P I M P 3 D TUT’s comment.

Josh did not leech this, and I seriously doubt you’ll be able to make a character step back/forward in WC, Every source that has been released here on MSCP, par maybe around 5 have had all, if not most skills already programmed into the server, while Josh’s source had no skills or “Awesome” features that people like to start their server off with.

The source was clean.[/quote]Rofl? Nty Czar is the most crappiest server ever. I rather look at my own source client.java too make woodcutting script, O WAIT ITZ ALRADY DERE!!! HAHAHAAAAA

Don’t say shit if you can’t even code ::outfit

Read full topic
